game.name: VeilWood
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Protect your farm from twisted creatures, explore new areas, and put an end to the Azure Haze in this first person real time strategy dark farming sim.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Protect your farm from twisted creatures, explore new areas, and put an end to the Azure Haze in this first person real time strategy dark farming sim.
